news.title: Trump slaps 10% extra tariff on Canada over Reagan trade ad
news.summary: President Donald Trump is imposing an extra 10% tariff on Canadian imports. He says it is for what he says is a misleading TV ad featuring former President Ronald Reagan.

news.title: American Airlines is arriving late to the luxury travel boom. Can it catch up?
news.summary: American Airlines has fallen behind large rivals Delta and United in seeking out luxury customers, bringing in profit and more. American Airlines: We are committed to serving our customers in the best way we can.

news.title: Timothy Mellon is Trump's $130 million mystery military donor: NYT
news.summary: Reclusive billionaire Timothy Mellon, whose grandfather was a Treasury secretary, was a top donor to President Donald Trump for the 2024 election. Mellon's grandfather was Treasury secretary.

news.title: Top Wall Street analysts pound the table for solid returns in these 3 stocks
news.summary: TipRanks' ranking service highlights three stocks, including Pinterest and Uber Technologies, that are favored by Wall Street's top pros. TipRanks: Pinterest, Uber and Lyft are among the top stocks to buy this week.

news.title: Government shutdown curtails nonprofit funding, putting vital services in jeopardy
news.summary: As the standoff in Washington drags on, many nonprofits have lost access to federal grants. The grants are essential to their operations, nonprofits say.

news.title: The surprising stocks leading the tech sector this year thanks to an AI renaissance
news.summary: Western Digital and Seagate were once sleepy cyclical stocks. But storage technology is now at the heart of the AI boom. Analysts see no signs of a slowdown ahead.

news.title: ‘We don’t want to get into trouble’: Can we give our daughter a $30K wedding gift without involving the IRS?
news.summary: “What is the best way to go about this?” he asks. “What are the best ways to get people to talk to each other?’”

news.title: Our two daughters are struggling with student debt. Should we dip into our $1.8 million 401(k)s to buy them apartments?
news.summary: Each apartment would be priced close to $225,000, the company says. “Each apartment will be priced around $225k,” the company adds.

news.title: I received an inheritance from my father’s estate, but the executor wants me to give it back. What should I do?
news.summary: “The attorney for my late father stated that all beneficiaries needed to wait 10 months before disbursements from the sale of the home could be released.”

news.title: ‘A friend calls it the everything bubble’: Why do so many economists fear a 1929-style crash?
news.summary: We have faced fears, for more than 10 years, that the market is going to experience the kind of crash not seen in nearly a century.
